item.title: Monitoring while you develop with Grafana + Telegraf + Prometheus + InfluxDB
item.description: Index InfluxDB in a container Prometheus in a container Grafana in a container Installing/configuring Telegraf Importing dashboards Setting up InfluxDB in a container Note: This is a distillation of the InfluxDB setup documentation that I used - it can be found HERE Assuming you’re already set up with a nice docker host somewhere, run the following, but change the variable values: docker run --rm influxdb influxd config > influxdb.
